classes.name: TemplateLookup

directives.name: ButtonDirective
InputDirective

providers.name: { provide: NG_VALUE_ACCESSOR, useExisting: InputDirective, multi: true }

components.name: AppComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngFor="let color of colors">
    <ng-container *ngFor="let outlined of outlineds">
        <ng-container *ngFor="let size of sizes">
            <button [color]="color" [outlined]="outlined" [size]="size" adrButton>Button</button>
        </ng-container>
    </ng-container>
</ng-container>

components.name: DummyComponent
InputDummyComponent
InputReactiveFormDummyComponent

modules.name: AppModule
ButtonModule
InputModule

variables.name: BasicTemplate
ReactiveTemplate

functions.name: AutoUnsubscribe
functions.description:
Allows to auto unsubscribe from Observables.

Automatically check if a (_)subscriptions property exist (must be a Subscription[]), if yes then unsubscribe all. Automatically check this properties, all one which are Observable and is not in the excludeProps is unsubscribe.

src/components/atoms/forms/input/input.s.name: BasicTemplate
ReactiveTemplate

src/components/core/common/auto-unsubscr.name: AutoUnsubscribe
src/components/core/common/auto-unsubscr.description:
Allows to auto unsubscribe from Observables.

Automatically check if a (_)subscriptions property exist (must be a Subscription[]), if yes then unsubscribe all. Automatically check this properties, all one which are Observable and is not in the excludeProps is unsubscribe.
